Address: 52 DISCOVERY, IRVINE, California, 92618, United States of America
CompanyDescription: We are a global medical technology company that develops, manufactures and markets a variety of noninvasive monitoring technologies and hospital automation solutions. Our mission is to improve patient outcomes and reduce the cost of patient care. We provide our products to hospitals, emergency medical service (EMS) providers, home care providers, long-term care facilities, physician offices, veterinarians and consumers through our direct sales force, distributors and original equipment manufacturers (OEM) partners to hospitals, EMS providers, home care providers, long-term care facilities, physician offices, veterinarians and consumers. We were incorporated in California in May 1989 and reincorporated in Delaware in May 1996. Our core business is Measure-through Motion and Low Perfusion(TM) pulse oximetry, known as Masimo Signal Extraction Technology® (SET®) pulse oximetry.  ... More ...
